text: Here is a list of tools that can make Live USBs: *UNetbootin (Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora, and many others) *LinuxLive USB Creator (Ubuntu, Fedora, Debian, Damn Small Linux and many others) *Ubuntu Live USB creator (Ubuntu) *Live USB system creator (Ubuntu) *Fedora Live USB creator (Fedora) *Portable Workspace Creator, for Windows 8 Category:Computer-related lists Category:Software Live USB
title: List of tools to create Live USB systems
